results.title: Metformin suppresses epithelial sodium channel hyperactivation and its associated phenotypes in a mouse model of obstructive lung diseases.
results.text_hl: One possible modulator of @GENE_SCNN1A @GENE_20276 @@@ENaC@@@ is @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@), a key molecule that controls a wide variety of cellular signals; however, little is known about whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a clinically available @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ activator, has a protective role against @GENE_SCNN1A @GENE_20276 @@@ENaC@@@-associated @DISEASE_Chronic_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic pulmonary phenotypes@@@, such as @DISEASE_Emphysema @DISEASE_MESH:D004646 @@@emphysema@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Heart_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011660 @@@pulmonary dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: Nakashima R, Nohara H, Takahashi N, Nasu A, Hayashi M, Kishimoto T, Kamei S, Fujikawa H, Maruta K, Kawakami T, Eto Y, Ueno-Shuto K, Suico MA, Kai H, Shuto T. Metformin suppresses epithelial sodium channel hyperactivation and its associated phenotypes in a mouse model of obstructive lung diseases. J Pharmacol Sci. 2022 Jun;149(2):37-45. PMID: 35512853

results.title: A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.
results.text_hl: Medications were @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@cholecalciferol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Folic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005492 @@@folic acid@@@, a multivitamin, @CHEMICAL_Fluticasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068298 @@@fluticasone@@@ by inhalation, and, as needed, @CHEMICAL_Ipratropium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009241 @@@ipratropium@@@ by inhalation.

citations.NLM: Famularo G, Sordillo P, Stasolla A, Parisi MG. A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci. Chest. 2017 Oct;152(4):e95-e97. PMID: 28991556
